actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide that, in certain cases, retirement income may be treated as earned income for purposes of the deduction for two-earner married couples.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that retirement income may be treated as earned income for purposes of computing the deduction for two-earner married couples.

titles.title: A bill to provide that, in certain cases, retirement income may be treated as earned income for purposes of the deduction for two-earner married couples.
